Method Detail

getSubjectHash

public static String getSubjectHash(X509Certificate cert)
                             throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                    IOException
Return a certificate's subject hash.

This is equal to the value computed by openssl x509 -hash -noout -in cert.pem.

Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException
IOException

getSubjectHash

public static String getSubjectHash(PKCS10CertificationRequest req)
                             throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                    IOException
Return a certificate signing request's subject hash.

Same as getSubjectHash(java.security.cert.X509Certificate) but for a CSR. No openssl equivalent.

Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException
NoSuchAlgorithmException
IOException

getIssuerHash

public static String getIssuerHash(X509Certificate cert)
                            throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                   IOException
Return a certificate's issuer hash.

This is equal to the value computed by openssl x509 -issuer_hash -noout -in cert.pem.

Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException
IOException

getX509NameHash

public static long getX509NameHash(X509Name p)
                            throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                   IOException
Return the hash of an X509Name.

Same as openssl's X509_NAME_hash().

Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException
IOException

SignSMIME

public static String SignSMIME(String msg,
                               PrivateKey key,
                               X509Certificate cert)
                        throws GeneralSecurityException,
                               SMIMEException,
                               IOException
S/MIME sign a string.

The output is a MIME message consisting of two parts. The first is the MIME-encoded string supplied as input, the second is the message signed by the key with certificate embedded.

Example output: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/signed; protocol="application/pkcs7-signature"; micalg=sha1; boundary="----=_Part_1_190331520.1253198584335" ------=_Part_1_190331520.1253198584335 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit This is my important piece of text. ------=_Part_1_190331520.1253198584335 Content-Type: application/pkcs7-signature; name=smime.p7s; smime-type=signed-data Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="smime.p7s" Content-Description: S/MIME Cryptographic Signature OTAzMDMwMDAwMDBaFw0xMDAzMDMxMDQ5MDFaMFAxEjAQBgNVBAoTCWR1dGNoZ3JpZDEOMAwGA1UE ChMFdXNlcnMxDzANBgNVBAoTBm5pa2hlZjEZMBcGA1UEAxMQV2lsbGVtIHZhbiBFb.......etc. yAAAAAAAAA== ------=_Part_1_190331520.1253198584335--

Throws:
GeneralSecurityException
SMIMEException
IOException
